lead_paragraph: The San Antonio Spurs know they didn't face a fair fight in the first-round of the playoffs, so they took what they could in sweeping an injury-depleted opponent.

headline.print_headline: Spurs Ready to Wait for Semifinals After Sweep of Memphis
headline.main: Spurs Ready to Wait for Semifinals After Sweep of Memphis
